name: Trial for the throne
description:
Game made for ScoreJam10: https://itch.io/jam/scorejam10

Title: Trial for the throne

Code made by: Tommy Kobberø Andersen (http://mightycodedragon.com) 

Game description: You are a noble knight with an important quest. Find an elixir for the dying king. This rare elixir can only be found in the deep forest and the first knight to get it will inherit the throne. 

Game details: Game submitted to ScoreJam10 with the theme "Direction" and an online highscore system made with php/mysql. Keyboard arrow keys for controlling character.

Game engine: Unity 2019.3.5f1

Assets referencer: 

Graphics: 

  • Hero: https://sanctumpixel.itch.io/loreon-kingdom-pixel-art-character-asset 
  • Skeleton: https://sanctumpixel.itch.io/skeleton-warriors-pixel-art-monster-asset
  • Ghost: https://ismartal.itch.io/2d-animated-halloween-characters
  • Witch: https://ismartal.itch.io/2d-animated-halloween-characters
  • Maze: https://pixabay.com/photos/maze-green-labyrinth-hedge-2166001/
  • Trees: https://edermunizz.itch.io/free-pixel-art-plataformer-painted-style
  • Terrain: https://edermunizz.itch.io/free-pixel-art-plataformer-painted-style

Music:  

  • Menu music by Eric Matyas (http://soundimage.org)
  • Ingame and maze music by: www.bensound.com
